effect.name: PixelPalette with lerp (Edit)
effect.author: TimmyTopHat, Edit by NaitorStudios
effect.description:
Change a palette to another, missing colors will not be changed. DX9 limited to 32 colors, DX11 limited to 256 colors. Both requires a texture with 256x2 pixels. It doesn't play well with Blend Coef on DX11 Premultiplied, use the parameter instead.
Last Updated: 2026-01-11 00:56

parameter.name: Palettes
parameter.description: A palette with 256px of width, use each row for a new palette. First line will be the original colors followed by the replacements in the second line.

parameter.name: Mix Value
parameter.description: Mixes the colors between Palette A and B.
